theEdgeheg:BloodyKatana.NAME: Bloody Katana
theEdgeheg:BloodyKatana.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [#ff0000]Damage[]. NL NL If Fatal, heal !M!.

theEdgeheg:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theEdgeheg:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theEdgeheg:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theEdgeheg:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theEdgeheg:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theEdgeheg:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theEdgeheg:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theEdgeheg:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theEdgeheg:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theEdgeheg:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theEdgeheg:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theEdgeheg:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !theEdgeheg:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
